product_name: Partners West 50 Hikes in the North Georgia Mountains
long_description: From the heights of Lookout Mountain, along the Blue Ridge and to the shores of the Chattooga River, this guide charts 50 spectacular hikes in the mountains north of Atlanta.
short_description: From the heights of Lookout Mountain, along the Blue Ridge and to the shores of the Chattooga River, this guide charts 50 spectacular hikes in the mountains north of Atlanta.
